objects.text:
• Eye-catching pepperoni pizza print
• High-quality canvas with artwork
• Classic high-top with padding
• Durable rubber sole, vintage finish

product_details.name: Pizza Passion High-Top Sneakers - The Ultimate Food Lover's Footwear
product_details.description:
• Eye-catching pepperoni pizza print design covering the entire shoe
• High-quality canvas material with vibrant, photo-realistic food artwork
• Classic high-top silhouette with comfortable padded collar
• Durable rubber sole with vintage-style off-white finish
• Traditional lace-up closure with metal eyelets
• Breathable interior with cushioned insole
• Perfect for pizza enthusiasts and unique fashion lovers
• Available in unisex sizing
• Machine washable for easy maintenance
• Exclusive limited edition design
• Great conversation starter and statement piece
• Ideal gift for foodies and sneaker collectors

banner_details:
This banner features a bold and vibrant promotional design for a food-themed product—pizza print high-top sneakers. The background is diagonally divided into two sections: a warm orange gradient paired with a deep maroon shade, accented by geometric overlays and sparkles. The prominent heading (`heading`) uses a fun, chunky typeface in white to instantly grab attention, while the tagline (`tagline`) in a yellow-gold tone complements the theme playfully. The product feature list (`description`) is laid out with bullet points for easy reading. Pricing is clearly emphasized in large font (`price`). The call-to-action button (`cta`, `cta_button_background`) appears in striking yellow with contrasting text. A dynamic shoe image (`product_image`) with pepperoni pizza graphics adds visual appeal and reinforces the theme.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Maroon: `#5D0909`
- Burnt Orange: `#CA3E0B`
- Vibrant Orange: `#F85C15`
- Mustard Yellow: `#FFC107`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a high-top sneaker with a vibrant pizza print design. The dominant colors are a golden crust beige (#F4C178), pepperoni red (#B62E1F), tomato sauce orange-red (#E85C31), melted cheese yellow (#FBD267), and garnish green (#1DA340). These colors are richly saturated and well-blended, creating a lifelike food-inspired aesthetic that is both fun and attention-grabbing. The integration of white shoelaces and inner lining (#EAEAEA) contrasts sharply with the warm tones, helping highlight the pizza graphic. For an advertisement banner, using this warm, appetizing palette with a bold, playful font can effectively capture the flavor-infused theme and visual appeal.
